Articles.Content:
No doubt we have all heard this story briefly mentioned in the media. It wasn\'t until I read the following description on wikipedia that I finally made the connection:

The satellite was launched on 13 April 2012 at 7:39 am KST aboard the Unha-3 carrier rocket from Sohae Satellite Launching Station. The rocket exploded 90 seconds after launch near the end of the firing of the first stage of the rocket.

Is it now becoming apparent that KSP is actually a parody of the maligned Kim Space Program?

Are you implying North Korea can afford grass?

Also, Sung should\'ve been in the middle.
Of course! :\'( How could I ever relegate the eternal president to the copilot\'s position?
